AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

marketplacePage.title: Global Marketplace
marketplacePage.description: Discover agricultural products, equipment, and services from around the world.
marketplacePage.noItemsHint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

create.title: Create a New Listing
create.description: Share a product or service with the DamDoh network.

form.namePlaceholder: e.g., Organic Hass Avocados, Tractor Rental Service
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of your product or service.
form.locationPlaceholder: e.g., Nairobi, Kenya or California, USA
form.sustainableDescription: This item or service utilizes or promotes sustainable practices.
form.skillsPlaceholder: List the key skills or qualifications for this service.

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find skilled professionals and services across the agricultural value chain.
talentExchangePage.searchPlaceholder: Search by skill, service, or professional...
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later for new listings.

ProfilePage.tempDisplayNotice: Note: This is a temporary display of raw profile data. A more user-friendly layout will be implemented soon.
ProfilePage.recentActivityDescription: A summary of recent actions taken by this user on {appName}.

ProfilePage.universalIdModalDescription: Present this QR code to authorized agents or partners to securely share your public profile information.

notificationsPage.title: Notifications
notificationsPage.description: Recent activity from across the DamDoh platform.
notificationsPage.placedNewOrder: placed a new order for one of your items.

attendees.title: Event Attendees
attendees.description: View and manage all registered attendees for this event.
attendees.noAttendees: No attendees have registered for this event yet.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account using your trusted network.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start.
recoverPage.step2: Show the generated QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code to confirm your identity, restoring your access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh connection scan this temporary QR code with the 'Help a Friend' feature.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is valid for 10 minutes.

editProfilePage.title: Edit Profile for {name}
editProfilePage.description: Update your public-facing information. Your changes will be visible to other users on the platform.

networkPage.description: Find and connect with stakeholders across the entire agricultural supply chain.
networkPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, role, or summary...
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.

errors.title: Error

searchPage.title: Search DamDoh
searchPage.description: Find exactly what you're looking for across our entire platform.

hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Success with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform for the entire agricultural supply chain. Connect with farmers, buyers, and experts to grow your business and build a sustainable future.

features.title: A Toolbox for Growth
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides everything you need to manage, market, and grow your agricultural business.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: Connect with verified stakeholders. Find farmers, buyers, input suppliers, and logistics partners with our AI-powered suggestion engine.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products, equipment, and services. Expand your reach beyond local markets and find new opportunities.

forums.title: Knowledge Forums
forums.description: Share your expertise, ask questions, and learn from a community of agricultural professionals in dedicated discussion forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer your professional services or find skilled labor, from custom harvesting to agronomy consultation.

forWho.title: A Platform for the Entire Ecosystem
forWho.description: Whether you're planting seeds or delivering the final product, DamDoh is designed to support your role in the supply chain.

farmers.title: Farmers & Cooperatives
farmers.description: Manage your farm, track your produce with VTIs, and get direct access to buyers and financial services.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable products directly from producers and ensure supply chain integrity.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more efficient agricultural sector.

cta.title: Ready to Grow with DamDoh?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of agricultural professionals building a more connected and sustainable future.

FarmManagement.title: Farm Management Hub
FarmManagement.description: Your central command center for all farming operations. Track crops, manage inputs, view financials, and access educational guides.

myFarms.title: My Farms & Crops
myFarms.description: Oversee all your farms, plots, and active crop cycles. Track progress from planting to harvest.

knf.title: KNF Input Assistant
knf.description: Create and track your Korean Natural Farming inputs like FPJ and FAA with guided recipes and reminders.

financials.title: Money Matters
financials.description: A simple way to track your farm's income and expenses to understand profitability.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Keep a record of your farm equipment, tools, and other valuable assets. (Coming Soon)

about.title: About DamDoh
about.subtitle: Connecting the world's agricultural supply chain for a sustainable future.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower every stakeholder in the agricultural ecosystem with the digital tools, network, and insights necessary to thrive sustainably and feed the world responsibly.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: We envision a globally connected agricultural supply chain that is transparent, equitable, efficient, and regenerative, ensuring food security and prosperity for all.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.content: We champion practices that nurture the planet and ensure long-term viability.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: We believe in the power of connection and community to solve complex challenges.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We leverage technology to create practical, intelligent solutions for real-world problems.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.content: We are committed to building trust through transparency and ethical conduct.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.content: We provide tools and knowledge to help our users succeed on their own terms.

team.title: Our Team
team.intro: DamDoh is powered by a diverse team of technologists, agronomists, and supply chain experts passionate about transforming agriculture.
team.member1Bio: An agricultural economist with 20 years of experience in global supply chains.
team.member2Bio: Leads the development of our AI and platform technologies.
team.member3Bio: Manages our network of field agents and farmer outreach programs.
team.note: Note: This is a representative team for illustrative purposes.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Help us revolutionize the agricultural supply chain.

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us?
whyWorkWithUs.intro: At DamDoh, you'll be part of a mission-driven team dedicated to making a tangible impact on global food systems. We value:
whyWorkWithUs.point1: Meaningful Work: Solve real-world challenges that affect millions of people.
whyWorkWithUs.point2: Innovation: Work with cutting-edge technology like AI and IoT.
whyWorkWithUs.point3: Global Impact: Contribute to a platform with a truly global reach.
whyWorkWithUs.point4: Collaborative Culture: Join a supportive and diverse team of experts.
whyWorkWithUs.point5: Growth Opportunities: Grow your skills as we grow our platform.

noOpenings.title: No Current Openings
noOpenings.content1: We are always looking for passionate and talented individuals. If you believe you can contribute to our mission, please send your resume to <emailLink>careers@damdoh.org</emailLink>.

job1.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Next.js/Firebase)
job1.description: Seeking an experienced full-stack developer to help build and scale our core platform features.

job2.title: Lead Agronomist - East Africa
job2.description: Manage our field agent network and provide expert agronomic support to our farming communities in East Africa.

job3.title: Product Manager - Marketplace & E-commerce
job3.description: Drive the strategy and development of our global marketplace and talent exchange features.

communityGuidelines.title: DamDoh Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.subtitle: Our commitment to fostering a safe, respectful, and productive environment for all agricultural stakeholders.
communityGuidelines.intro: Welcome to DamDoh! By joining our platform, you agree to abide by these guidelines to ensure a positive experience for everyone. Violations may result in content removal, account suspension, or other actions deemed necessary.

respectful.title: Be Respectful and Constructive
respectful.description: Treat all members of the DamDoh community with respect. Engage in constructive discussions, share knowledge positively, and avoid personal attacks, harassment, or hate speech.

authentic.title: Maintain Authenticity and Transparency
authentic.description: Represent yourself and your business honestly. Do not impersonate others or provide misleading information in your profile, listings, or communications. Clearly state your role in the supply chain.

relevant.title: Keep Discussions Relevant
relevant.description: When participating in forums or groups, ensure your contributions are relevant to the topic. Avoid spamming, unsolicited advertising, or off-topic content. Focus on agricultural supply chain matters.

fairTrade.title: Foster Fair and Ethical Trade
fairTrade.description: Conduct business dealings with integrity. Honor commitments, provide accurate product/service descriptions, and engage in fair pricing. DamDoh promotes ethical trade practices.

sustainable.title: Promote Sustainable Practices
sustainable.description: We encourage discussions and sharing of knowledge related to sustainable and regenerative agriculture. Support initiatives that improve soil health, biodiversity, and food security.

reporting.title: Reporting Violations
reporting.content: If you encounter content or behavior that violates these guidelines, please report it to our moderation team through the platform's reporting tools or by contacting <emailLink>support@damdoh.org</emailLink>.

communityGuidelines.conclusion: Thank you for helping us build a thriving and trustworthy agricultural supply chain community on DamDoh!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out with any questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries.

sendMessage.title: Send Us a Message
sendMessage.note: Note: This is a visual placeholder. Form submission is not active.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy notice for DamDoh ('we', 'us', or 'our'), describes how and why we might collect, store, use, and/or share ('process') your information when you use our services ('Services'), such as when you visit our website or our mobile application. Reading this privacy notice will help you understand your privacy rights and choices.

whatInfoWeCollect.heading: 1. WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT?
whatInfoWeCollect.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the Services, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us. This includes profile data, user-generated content, and transaction data.

howWeUseInfo.heading: 2. HOW DO WE PROCESS YOUR INFORMATION?
howWeUseInfo.content: We process your information to provide, improve, and administer our Services, communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law. We may also process your information for other purposes with your consent.

willInfoBeShared.heading: 3. WHEN AND WITH WHOM DO WE SHARE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?
willInfoBeShared.content: We may share information in specific situations described in this section and/or with the following third parties. We may need to share your personal information with other users on the platform for networking and transactions, with business partners, affiliates, and during business transfers.

cookiesAndTracking.heading: 4. DO WE USE COOKIES AND OTHER TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES?
cookiesAndTracking.content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to access or store information. Specific information about how we use such technologies and how you can refuse certain cookies is set out in our Cookie Notice.

howLongWeKeepInfo.heading: 5. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION?
howLongWeKeepInfo.content: We keep your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy notice unless otherwise required by law.

howWeKeepInfoSafe.heading: 6. HOW DO WE KEEP YOUR INFORMATION SAFE?
howWeKeepInfoSafe.content: We have implemented a series of technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information, no electronic transmission over the Internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

minors.heading: 7. DO WE COLLECT INFORMATION FROM MINORS?
minors.content: We do not knowingly solicit data from or market to children under 18 years of age. By using the Services, you represent that you are at least 18 or that you are the parent or guardian of such a minor and consent to such minor dependent’s use of the Services.

privacyRights.heading: 8. WHAT ARE YOUR PRIVACY RIGHTS?
privacyRights.content: In some regions (like the EEA, UK, and Canada), you have rights that allow you greater access to and control over your personal information. You may review, change, or terminate your account at any time.

controlsForDoNotTrack.heading: 9. CONTROLS FOR DO-NOT-TRACK FEATURES
controlsForDoNotTrack.content: Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems and mobile applications include a Do-Not-Track ('DNT') feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected. At this stage, no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online.

updatesToNotice.heading: 10. DO WE MAKE UPDATES TO THIS NOTICE?
updatesToNotice.content: We may update this privacy notice from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated 'Revised' date and the updated version will be effective as soon as it is accessible.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: Welcome to DamDoh. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of the DamDoh website and mobile application (the 'Platform'). By accessing or using our Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

agreementToTerms.heading: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content: By using our Platform, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Platform.

intellectualProperty.heading: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: The Platform and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of DamDoh and its licensors. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of DamDoh.

userRepresentations.heading: 3. User Representations
userRepresentations.content: By using the Platform, you represent and warrant that: (1) all registration information you submit will be true, accurate, current, and complete; (2) you will maintain the accuracy of such information; (3) you have the legal capacity and you agree to comply with these Terms.

prohibitedActivities.heading: 4. Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: You may not access or use the Platform for any purpose other than that for which we make the Platform available. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to: fraud, spamming, copyright infringement, and harassing other users.

platformManagement.heading: 5. Platform Management
platformManagement.content: We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to: (1) monitor the Platform for violations of these Terms; (2) take appropriate legal action against anyone who, in our sole discretion, violates the law or these Terms; (3) in our sole discretion and without limitation, refuse, restrict access to, limit the availability of, or disable any of your Contributions or any portion thereof.

termAndTermination.heading: 6. Term and Termination
termAndTermination.content: These Terms shall remain in full force and effect while you use the Platform. WITHOUT LIMITING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF THESE TERMS, WE RESERVE THE RIGHT TO, IN OUR SOLE DISCRETION AND WITHOUT NOTICE OR LIABILITY, DENY ACCESS TO AND USE OF THE PLATFORM TO ANY PERSON FOR ANY REASON.

modificationsAndInterruptions.heading: 7. Modifications and Interruptions
modificationsAndInterruptions.content: We reserve the right to change, modify, or remove the contents of the Platform at any time or for any reason at our sole discretion without notice. We also reserve the right to modify or discontinue all or part of the Platform without notice at any time. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, price change, suspension, or discontinuance of the Platform.

governingLaw.heading: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms and your use of the Platform are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where DamDoh is registered, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

disputeResolution.heading: 9. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: To expedite resolution and control the cost of any dispute, you agree to first attempt to negotiate any Dispute (except those Disputes expressly provided below) informally for at least thirty (30) days before initiating arbitration. Such informal negotiations commence upon written notice from one person to the other.

contactUs.heading: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: In order to resolve a complaint regarding the Platform or to receive further information regarding use of the Platform, please contact us.

termsOfService.conclusion: You can contact us via our <contactLink>contact page</contactLink>.
